    • PDX R Group

    Study group

    This is a sub-group of pdxrlang, that is essentially an R study group. Right now, they are meeting to go through the Coursera John Hopkinâ€™s R Programming course. This group is organized by Audrey Julian.

    They generally meet once every week, on the weekend.

    Check out below for upcoming meetups.
